text: Hudson Hawk is an American action-adventure criminal comedy movie released in 1991. In the movie, Bruce Willis plays Hudson Hawk, David Caruso is Kit Kat and Andie MacDowell is Anna Baragli. The subject is burglary and Mafia crimes. This movie was released May 1991. The reviews were very bad. The box office performance was very poor. == Other websites == * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:1991 crime movies Category:1991 action movies Category:1991 adventure movies Category:1990s criminal comedy movies Category:American action movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Italy Category:Movies directed by Michael Lehmann
title: Hudson Hawk
